trans-unit.source: This exception is thrown when no matching principal object could be found with the specified parameters.
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"></xref> class.
The default constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException> class.
The <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message that describes the error.
This message takes into account the current system culture.
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"></xref> class with the specified error message.
The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
The text of the error message.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"></xref> class from the specified <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> instances.

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"></xref>

A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext"></xref> that contains the source of the serialized stream that is associated with the new <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"></xref>
Instantiates a new instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException"></xref> class with the specified error message and specified nested exception.

The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.AccountManagement.NoMatchingPrincipalException> instance is initialized with the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property set to the value of `message` and the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property set to the value of `innerException`.
If `message` is `null`, the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property is initialized to a system-supplied message.
